messages.title: SPECIAL BREXIT
messages.content: Just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. So whoever is in Prime Minister must be up to the job and ready to start.

messages.title: LOWER TAXES, LOWER BILLS AND BETTER-PAID JOBS
messages.content: Many families struggle to cope with monthly bills. So Theresa May and the Conservatives will cap rip-off energy tariffs.

messages.title: A LOSS OF JUST 6 SEATS AND THERESA MAY’S GOVERNMENT LOSES ITS MAJORITY – PUTTING BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS AT RISK
BRITAIN WOULD FACE THE CHAOS OF A HUNG PARLIAMENT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May plans for Brexit will end free movement of EU citizens, allowing the UK to control its immigration.
Theresa May's plan for a good Brexit deal is vital to maintain a strong economy and everything depends on getting a good Brexit deal.
Theresa May and Conservatives want to control immigration, reduce the control of our laws from Europe to Britain, and Theresa May doesn't believe in uncontrolled immigration.
It's vital that every family has the care they need, which is why they want to keep the economy strong to fund the NHS, and they call on the help of a strong Brexit deal.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Nicola Sturgeon, Tim Farron
mentions.tacticalSituation: A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s government loses its majority – putting Brexit negotiations at risk. Seats like yours will decide

issues.brexitEurope: Getting the Brexit negotiations right is central to everything: our country’s future and our Brexit future.
issues.education: There are more good and outstanding schools than ever before. Theresa May and her team will give every child the best start in life by raising school funding even more, every year.
issues.health: It's vital that every family has the care they need, which is why they want to keep the economy strong to fund the NHS, and they call on the help of a strong Brexit deal.
issues.immigration: Theresa May and Conservatives want to control immigration, reduce the control of our laws from Europe to Britain, and Theresa May doesn't believe in uncontrolled immigration.

endorsements.endorsement: SKY-HIGH immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn – the Labour leader signalled today.
LABOUR PLOTS BREXIT DEAL WITH OTHER PARTIES IF TORIES DON’T WIN ELECTION MAJORITY.

quotes.text: SKY-HIGH immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn – the Labour leader signalled today.
LABOUR PLOTS BREXIT DEAL WITH OTHER PARTIES IF TORIES DON’T WIN ELECTION MAJORITY.

images.caption: Theresa May ready to start Brexit negotiations.
